short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects X-Clacks-Overhead header and displays its value as a toast notification

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are hidden memorials to the dead in the internet's overhead! Inspired by the story of the Clacks in Terry Pratchett's Discworld series, developer use the "x-clacks-overhead" header to pay homage to those who have departed.

"Keeping their name forever alive. As long as their name is still passed along the Clacks, Death cannot have them."
